backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining storage, types, authorization mixins, and state for cruises, itineraries, bookings, reviews, alerts, branding settings, and shareable links.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor data structures and logic for upgrading stored maps and records across versions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of various frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component initializing providers, routing logic for shared itinerary pages, and rendering main UI sections.
Component that detects new admin alerts and displays toast notifications for unviewed booking alerts.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog with tabs for alerts, bookings, logo management, and branding, loading data and marking alerts as viewed.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Dialog for viewing current user role and assigning admin privileges to the logged-in identity.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Booking modal allowing users to select cabins, calculate totals, and submit a booking for an itinerary.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Cruise deal card showing itinerary details, destination image, and favorite toggling with identity checks.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface for adding, editing, previewing, and deleting cruise line logos with file upload support.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Section displaying partner cruise line logos with loading skeletons and graceful empty states.
Displays a dialog listing the user's favorite cruise deals, showing loading skeletons or an empty state when needed.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Fetches and displays featured cruise deals in an auto-scrolling carousel with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main site header with navigation, authentication handling, admin controls, and dialogs for favorites and bookings.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Shows the homepage hero section with a background image, marketing text, action buttons, and stats.
Displays detailed cruise itinerary information with reviews, booking options, sharing, and PDF generation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name before continuing.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Displays and manages cruise reviews, including creating, editing, deleting, and listing reviews with star ratings and authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Provides search and filter UI for cruises, including text search, dropdown filters, sliders, and rendering filtered cruise results.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Renders a public itinerary page using shareable links, applying branding settings and showing itinerary details, images, and sections.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: Offers a settings form for updating and resetting shared page branding values like colors, logo, and text with backend persistence.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Shows a modal listing a userâ€™s bookings with status, dates, and itinerary info, including loading states and detailed booking cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading identities, login flow, and state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps actor-based backend calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cruise data, itineraries, user profiles, and related entities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including ocean and sunset color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Validates and sanitizes color strings, providing safe fallbacks and style application helpers.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable PDF-style itinerary by opening a new window and injecting styled HTML content.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Merges fetched branding settings with defaults for shared itinerary pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, plugins, content paths, and extensive custom color/theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing feature requirements with versions.
